creditline: Gift of Elissa and Paul Cahn
description: tan background; black cross at C with blue tips; stylized long, narrow, black, white, and blue human figure holding long object along each edge; pair of smaller human figures standing on each end of cross; blue, black, and white branches coming from three of the interior corners of the cross; yellow and blue zigzag in fourth corner of cross; has heading band
title: Sandpainting textile
